column5: Cozy, convenient and quiet; stay on a working farm in an apartment above separate garage (via stairway) with private entrance. Good for those looking to take advantage of all the dining, shopping and attractions in surrounding towns. We are perfectly situated: five minutes to Comfort, 25 to Kerrville, 25 to Fredericksburg and 20 to Boerne. This along with the bedroom, pull-out couch and full sized kitchen make it flexible and convenient. One small well-behaved, house-trained dog welcome.
